name: Box Shooter (sparty100)
description:
Instructions:

  • Click to shoot
  • Use mouse to look around
  • Shoot stars for points
  • Shoot boxes for extra time
  • Shoot bombs to lose time
  • Get as many points as possible before time runs out

A game from my MI 117 class. Most of it is based on the instructions, but some modifications have been made.

Modifications:

  • Pew sound provided by Sterling King
  • Bullet model created by me
  • Bomb model created by me
  • Star model created by me
